name: MEDICATED (AGLgames)
description:
MEDICATED is a short horror project created over 3 weeks.

For some, the struggle of the mind is more than just coping.

MEDICATED is a project meant to encapsulate a small fraction of some of the darkest horrors of the suffering of mental illness.

CONTROLS:

WASD: Movement

E: Open Doors

F: Toggle Flashlight

LEFT MOUSE CLICK: Pick up objects

75% of all Donations will be given to the NAMI (Home | NAMI: National Alliance on Mental Illness) 

After the first 2 weeks - 1 month, I will compile a mega-compilation of my reactions to your playthroughs on my Youtube Channel ChrisALOO - YouTube where I will take your genuine feedback and apply to future projects.

MEDICATED is the first horror game project created by AGLgames.
